data.message:
Skyscrapers, skyscrapers,
Walls, elevators, floors...
I will tell you guys
About rise of the machines.

Chu flashed a blue light,
The wind blew from the river.
- Terminator, Terminator! -
The men were muttering.
Near the bar on the highway
People surrounded the crowd:
"Stainless steel?" 
- The "stainless steel!" Meets our hero.

And then easily, carelessly
A low voice said:
"I need your clothes".
The guy gave. And who wouldn't?
Suddenly from a dark quarter -
Robot of liquid metal!
A hail of bullets, it's all over!!!
But we know: the bullet - fool,
Terminator - well done.

Our hero with a black eye
Fell swoop grabbed the enemy in a fist.
 The one - through my fingers. This plague!
It is immediately clear watery.
Mae, sister of the medical battalion:
"Let me bandage you!"
He smiled, "No,
I'll have before the wedding".

And up Terminator,
And BA-boom, cigdem, Boo-Boo!
All kaput...
And the city thought that the teachings go.
All of America is wondering -
Than hero award?
Maybe the resort to send,
Or order to weld?

- No, guys, I'm not proud
I am not a man.
So I will say: why should I order?
Anyway, I albeback.
Rest in peace, Sarah Connor,
Will keep your peaceful sleep
Terminator, robot modest
With a human face.
